data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Incheon Utd takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 2, Ban-Suk Oh (Incheon Utd) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd in their own half.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Seoul in the half of Incheon Utd.
Free kick for Incheon Utd in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Seoul.
In the minute 7, In Seoul a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Can Seoul capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Seoul pushes forward through Se Jong Ju, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 10, Seoul to take a throw-in in Incheon Utd territory.
Osmar Barba (Seoul) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Seoul's Osmar Barba is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 12, Corner awarded to Seoul.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd at World Cup Stadium.
Seoul awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 16, Seoul have a dangerous throw-in.
Goal kick for Seoul at World Cup Stadium.
Incheon Utd needs to be cautious. Seoul have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 19, Seoul drives forward and Kim Jin-ya gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in Seoul.
Incheon Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 21, Seoul drive upfield and Jung Han-min gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Incheon Utd defender.
Ball safe as Incheon Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Seoul in their own half.
In the minute 25, Seoul's Jo Yeong-uk misses with an attempt on goal.
Incheon Utd have a goal kick.
Kim Won-sik (Seoul) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 27, Throw-in high up the field for Incheon Utd in Seoul.
Free kick for Incheon Utd in their own half.
Jeong Dong-yun of Incheon Utd gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 29, Ball goes out of play for a Seoul goal kick.
Corner awarded to Seoul.
Ball goes out of play for a Incheon Utd goal kick.
In the minute 33, Elias Aguilar puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Great play from Jeong Dong-yun to set up the goal.
Elias Aguilar of Incheon Utd smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 34, Can Incheon Utd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seoul's half?
Incheon Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Seoul to take a throw-in in Incheon Utd territory.
In the minute 38, Incheon Utd's Stefan Mugosa is on target but unsuccessful.
Incheon Utd are coming forward and Stefan Mugosa gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Seoul have a goal kick.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Incheon Utd in the half of Seoul.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Incheon Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Incheon Utd at World Cup Stadium.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Seoul are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 46, Incheon Utd make their first substitution with Song Shi-uh replacing Kim Jun-beom.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd at World Cup Stadium.
Throw-in Seoul.
In the minute 50, The home team replace Se Jong Ju with Han Seung-gyu.
Jung Han-min (Seoul) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 54, Seoul are pushing forward but Park Chu-young's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seoul.
Ball safe as Incheon Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 58, Incheon Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Incheon Utd in the half of Seoul.
Elias Aguilar (Incheon Utd) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 61, Incheon Utd pushes forward through Elias Aguilar, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Seoul close to the penalty box.
Kwon Seong-yun is replacing Jung Han-min for the home team.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd at World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 62, Elias Aguilar (Incheon Utd) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Rashid Mahazi is on a sub for Elias Aguilar for Incheon Utd.
In the minute 64, Seoul's Yoon Jong-gyu misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seoul.
Ball goes out of play for a Seoul goal kick.
In the minute 65, Incheon Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Seoul capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Incheon Utd's half?
Seoul takes a corner from the left.
In the minute 70, Free kick Incheon Utd.
Throw-in for Seoul in their own half.
In the minute 71, Incheon Utd have a goal kick.
Lee Tae-heui is booked for the away team.
Free kick in a good position for Seoul!
Goal kick for Incheon Utd at World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 73, Yun Ju-tae is replacing Kim Won-sik for the home team.
Free kick for Incheon Utd in their own half.
Kim Dae-jung is on a sub for Stefan Mugosa for Incheon Utd.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Incheon Utd in the half of Seoul.
Ball goes out of play for a Seoul goal kick.
In Seoul a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 80, Ball safe as Incheon Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Seoul awarded a free kick in their own half.
Seoul drive upfield and Yun Ju-tae gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Incheon Utd defender.
In the minute 82, Corner awarded to Seoul.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seoul.
Throw-in Seoul.
In the minute 84, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Seoul in their own half.
Can Incheon Utd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seoul's half?
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Seoul in the half of Incheon Utd.
Seoul to take a throw-in in Incheon Utd territory.
Free kick Seoul.
In the minute 88, Seoul takes a corner from the right.
Throw-in high up the field for Incheon Utd in Seoul.
Free kick Seoul.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
In Seoul a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Seoul are pushing forward but Osmar Barba's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Incheon Utd at World Cup Stadium.
Free kick for Seoul in the half of Incheon Utd.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The match is over. Final score 0-1.
Kim Jun-yeob (Incheon Utd) gets a yellow card.
Osmar Barba (Seoul) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Kim Do-hyeok is booked for the away team.
He's off! Ban-Suk Oh is shown a second yellow card.
